text1:
A two-stage missile suited for long-range support by backline combat ships. The second stage has a higher top speed, giving it a better chance of defeating point-defense systems.

A technologically mature weapon system, the Pilum-class missile is the obvious choice for long-range strikes by cautious captains. The warhead consists of a device capable of causing spot failures in active shields, and an EMP generator to deliver a modest punch through these gaps. Neither device is particularly effective due to the constraints imposed by the missile's outsized fuel tanks.

A sizable combat-rated autoloader and missile nanoforge system ensures continued usefulness in protracted engagements.

A heavily customizable fighter boasting two hybrid and two missile hardpoints, allowing for a wide variety of missions. The basic loadout a decoy flare launcher.

The fighter variant is fitted with an Assault Gun, a Vulcan Cannon, and two Salamander missiles suppllemented by an ECCM package.

The Fighter-Bomber variant carries a Railgun, a Vulcan Cannon, and two Harpoon missiles, also retaining the ECCM package.

The Superiority Fighter variant has hardened shields, improved RCS thrusters and carries both Locust and Breach SRMs along with two accurate Lasers.
